JedisPoolConfig(); poolConfig.setMaxTotal(8); poolConfig.setMaxIdle(8); poolConfig.setMinIdle(0); poolConfig.setMaxWait(Duration.ofMillis(1000)); jedisPool = new JedisPool(poolConfig,"192.168.200.130",6379,1000,"1234"); } public static Jedis getJedis(){ return jedisPool.getResource(); }} 1ï¼‰
